front.title: Mathematical Mesh 3.0 Part VIII: Cryptographic Algorithms

abstract.t: The Mathematical Mesh 'The Mesh' is an infrastructure that facilitates the exchange of configuration and credential data between multiple user devices and provides end-to-end security. This document describes the cryptographic algorithm suites used in the Mesh and the implementation of Multi-Party Encryption and Multi-Party Key Generation used in the Mesh. This document is also available online at http://mathmesh.com/Documents/draft-hallambaker-mesh- cryptography.html [1] .
